registries.description: List of NPM registries to search for private extensions. See https://github.com/npm/npm-registry-fetch#fetch-opts for additional properties.

name.description: Name to display for the registry.

registry.description: The address of the NPM registry which contains the extension packages. If omitted, the registry is determined according to NPM config files (https://docs.npmjs.com/files/npmrc).

query.description: Display only packages that match this query. This is either an array of search terms or a string with space-delimited terms. See https://github.com/npm/registry/blob/master/docs/REGISTRY-API.md#get-v1search

enablePagination.description: Make search requests until the registry gives an empty response. Set to false to work around servers that don't properly implement the "from" parameter of the search API. You may also need to increase "limit" when disabling this.

limit.description: Number of results to limit each query to when requesting package results.

recommendations.description: List of private extensions which should be recommended for users of this workspace. The identifier of an extension is always '${publisher}.${name}'. For example: 'garmin.private-extension-manager'.
